General.Name: Supriya Lifescience Limited
General.Description: Supriya Lifescience Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of bulk drugs and pharmaceutical chemicals worldwide. It offers active pharmaceutical ingredients, such as, anti-allergic, anti-asthmatic, decongestant, analgesic/anti-pyretic/anesthetic, anti"hypertensive, and anti-malarial products, as well as vitamins, and xanthine derivatives. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
